Assessment.QuestionText:
You want to display the following list in the ComboBox control: Engineer, Doctor, Writer, Developer.

Which one of the following codes will help you to achieve this?

Options.Option:
ComboBox cboProfesssion = new ComboBox();
cboProfesssion.Name = " cboProfesssion";
cboProfesssion.Text = "(Select)";
cboProfesssion.Items.Add("Engineer");
cboProfesssion.Items.Add("Doctor");
cboProfesssion.Items.Add("Writer");
cboProfesssion.Items.Add("Developer");
public void cboProfesssion_SelectedValueChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)
{
Message Box.Show("You have selected " + cboProfesssion.SelectedItem);
}

ComboBox cboProfesssion = new ComboBox();

cboProfesssion.Name = " cboProfesssion";
cboProfesssion.Text = "(Select)";
cboProfesssion.Items.Add("Engineer");
cboProfesssion.Items.Add("Doctor");
cboProfesssion.Items.Add("Writer");
cboProfesssion.Items.Add("Developer");
cboProfesssion.Location = new Point(20, 20);
cboCountry.Visible = true;

public void cboProfesssion_SelectedValueChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)
{
  Message Box.Show("You have selected " + cboProfesssion.SelectedItem);
}

ComboBox cboProfesssion = new ComboBox();

cboProfesssion.Name = " cboProfesssion";
cboProfesssion.Text = "(Select)";
cboProfesssion.Items.Add("Engineer");
cboProfesssion.Items.Add("Doctor");
cboProfesssion.Items.Add("Writer");
cboProfesssion.Items.Add("Developer");
cboProfesssion.Location = new Point(20, 20);
cboCountry.Visible = true;

public void cboProfesssion_SelectedValueChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)
{
  MessageBox.Show("You have selected " + cboProfesssion.SelectedItem);
}

ComboBox cboProfesssion = new ComboBox();

private void frmStudent_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)
{
cboProfesssion.Name = " cboProfesssion";
cboProfesssion.Text = "(Select)";
cboProfesssion.Item.Add("Engineer");
cboProfesssion.Item.Add("Doctor");
cboProfesssion.Item.Add("Writer");
cboProfesssion.Item.Add("Developer");
cboProfesssion.Location = new Point(20, 20);
cboProfesssion.SelectedValueChanged += new
EventHandler(cboProfesssion_SelectedValueChanged);
cboCountry.Visible = true;
Controls.Add(cboProfesssion);
}
void cboProfesssion_SelectedValueChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)
{
  Message Box.Show("You have selected " + cboProfesssion.SelectedItem);
}

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selection is: (C).
